projectsList.name: IREX
projectsList.tools: ERPNext, Python, Git, Orchestra(VM management), Penpot, Debian
projectsList.content: As a web developer at IREX, I've worked on several internal projects. On this project, I had to design web page mock-ups, front-end integration, deployments (Dev and UAT) and tests (integration), right through to maintenance. All in an agile environment. I also had to develop backend functionalities (e.g. event management, PayPal payments, etc.), orchestrate virtual machines (CloudOps), write scripts for deployment and automatic configuration of environments, and lead some new developers.

projectsList.name: Fluid Music
projectsList.tools: Kotlin, Roon database, MVVM, NextJs, Tailwind CSS
projectsList.content: Personal web project started when I was learning Java and Kotlin. It includes a website and a demo for an Android mobile application. I had to learn modern and intermediate/advanced concepts in Kotlin and Java such as coroutines, workmanagers, services and AIDL, Android auto, WearOS, ORM Room database, DataBiding. Not to mention optimized image loading and filtering, while using very little memory. And finally, the lifecycle managed by MVVM Live Data.
